knowledge_panel.description: wolfenstein 3d is a first-person shooter video game developed by id software and published by apogee software and formgen. originally released on may 5, 1992 for dos, it was inspired by the 1981 muse software video game castle wolfenstein, and is the third installment in the wolfenstein series. wikipedia
